fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to Defend up to 3 times. While Defending, all Redcoats gain basic defense, and you roleblock a random one of their visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your Fire ability is powerful and astral.
- After escaping, you may use Fire one time.
- Can talk to Redcoats at night, including after escaping.
- Access to "Volleyfire" factional ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Escape with all Redcoats. If a single Redcoat dies, the condition becomes kill everyone who opposes the king.
